name: CustomerContactRel
comment: Maintains the relation data between the customer, contact, and address.Depending on the type of roles, such as, primary or secondary contacts, different types of customer contacts and addresses are maintained.
vf short description: Maintains the relation data between the customer, contact, and address.Depending on the type of roles, such as, primary or secondary contacts, different types of customer contacts and addresses are maintained.

fields.name: CustomerContactRelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: CustomerContactRelKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the customer contact relationship in ALDM. Each Customer Contact Rel Key value represents a unique customer contact relationship. Generated Key based on Customer Key, Contact Key, Address Key, Contact Medium Ind and Effective Date

fields.name: RoleNameTypeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the name of the role played by the contact in the customer - contact relationship. If source is related party then Customer.relatedParty.roleIf source is contact medium then Customer.contactMedium.characteristic.type

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date from which the customer contact relation is effective. If source is related party then Customer.relatedParty.validFor.startDateTime If source id contact medium then Customer.contactMedium.validFor.startDateTime

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the customer contact relation record has expired. If source is related party then Customer.relatedParty.validFor.endDateTime If source id contact medium then Customer.contactMedium.validFor.endDateTime

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system

fields.name: ActiveFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the role that acted as the contact in the customer contact relationship is currently active.Values are:- 1 - Active- 0 - Inactive

fields.name: ContactSourceId
fields.comment: Identifies the contact in the source system.

fields.name: CustomerContactRelSourceId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the customer contact relationships in the source system.

fields.name: CrmCustomerSourceId
fields.comment: Object Id of the customer.

fields.name: ContactMediumInd
fields.comment: Indicates the contact medium, it could be contact, postal address and so on. If source is related party then Contact If source is contact medium then Postal Address

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
